News.Title: United Heat Transfer: Muted IPO Debut with 3.3% Premium
News.Summary: United Heat Transfer shares listed at ₹60.95 on NSE SME, a 3.3% premium over the IPO price of ₹59. The ₹30 crore SME IPO was oversubscribed 83.70 times. Proceeds will be used for debt repayment, working capital, and general corporate purposes.
